data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grossi, Paschoal Coelho, Grossi, Everardo Jose (2011): A new species of Amblyodus Westwood, 1878 (Coleoptera, Melolonthidae, Dynastinae) from South America. ZooKeys 75: 21-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.75.884, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.75.884
